ITexture

Defines how clients interact with textures

Functions
GetWidth
virtual uint32 GetWidth() = 0

Returns the width of the texture in pixels

virtual uint32 GetHeight() = 0

Returns the height of the texture in pixels

virtual DXGI_FORMAT GetFormat() = 0

Returns the pixel format of the texture

virtual void Update(
IGraphics *pGraphics
) = 0

Updates the underlying graphics card texture. Primarily used for video textures.

IGraphics*

graphics device

ICamera

Defines our camera object

Functions

virtual void SetParams(
float fov,
float aspectRatio,
float nearZ,
float farZ
) = 0

Sets the camera parameters

Parameters
fov
float

field of view

aspectRatio
float

Camera's aspect ratio

nearZ
float

distance to near plane

farZ
float

distance to far plane

SetPosition
virtual void SetPosition(
Vector3 &eye,
Vector3 &look,
Vector3 &up
) = 0

Sets the camera's position.

Parameters
eye
Vector3&

camera's world position

look
Vector3&

camera's look point. Used to define the camera's view direction

up
Vector3&

camera's up point. The eye point and up point define the up vector.

GetPosition
virtual void GetPosition(
Vector3 *pEye,
Vector3 *pLook,
Vector3 *pUp,
Vector3 *pU,
Vector3 *pV,
Vector3 *pN
) = 0

Gets the camera's position.

Parameters
eye

returns the camera's world position. Maybe nullptr.

look

returns the camera's look point. Maybe nullptr.

up

returns the camera's up point. Maybe nullptr.

pU
Vector3*

Returns the camera's X axis. Maybe nullptr.

pV
Vector3*

Returns the camera's Y axis. Maybe nullptr.

pN
Vector3*

Returns the camera's Z axis. Maybe nullptr.

Vector3 &offset
) = 0

offset
Vector3&

offset to apply

virtual void GetOffset(
Vector3 &offset
) = 0

Returns the current offset

Parameters
offset
Vector3&

Returns the offset that is being applied to the camera's eye and look point

ETrackballConstrain
enum
ETrackballConstrain

Defines available constraints for the trackball object

Constraint_None

Don't constrain rotations

Constraint_XAxis

Constrain rotations to be around X axis

Constraint_YAxis

Constrain rotations to be around Y axis

Constraint_ZAxis

Constrain rotations to be around Z axis

ITrackball

Defines the interface to our trackball implementation

Functions
BeginTracking
virtual void BeginTracking(
int screenX,
int screenY,
int screenW,
int screenH
) = 0

Called to start tracking

Parameters
screenX
int

mouse's X position where tracking starts in pixels

screenY
int

mouse's Y position where tracking starts in pixels

screenW
int

width of the window in pixels

screenH
int

height of the window in pixels

UpdateTracking
virtual bool UpdateTracking(
int screenX,
int screenY,
ETrackballConstrain constraint,
DirectX::XMMATRIX *pMatrix
) = 0

Called when mouse moves during trackball tracking

Parameters
screenX
int

current mouse's X position

screenY
int

current mouse's Y position

constraint
ETrackballConstrain

current constraint

pMatrix
DirectX::XMMATRIX*

Resulting trackball matrix

EndTracking
virtual void EndTracking() = 0

Called when mouse is released during trackball tracking

IRenderer

Defines the interface clients use to talk to the renderer

IRendererMarshaller

Creates a renderer that runs on its own thread and method calls are marshalled from the client to render thread.  renderer is on a separate thread where the client is calling from)

IShader

Defines the public interface for using CShader

IRenderMaterial

Defines a material that has its associated render element (as opposed to an IMaterialAttrib which only defines the attributes of the material).

IShaderMgr

Manages shaders within the renderer

Functions
FindShader
virtual void FindShader(
const wchar_t *pShaderName,
IShader **ppShader
) = 0

Finds an existing shader by name

Parameters
pShaderName
const wchar_t*

Name of shader to find.

ppShader
IShader**

Returns the found shader. Nullptr if no matching shader is found.

const wchar_t *pShaderName,
IShader *pShader
) = 0

Parameters

Name of shader

pShader
IShader*

virtual bool InPass(
int pass
) = 0

Returns whether the object is part of the specified pass

Parameters
pass
int

render pass

Returns

Returns True if object is part of the specified pass. False otherwise.
